de.iss.mv2.client.messaging

Class SwingMessageProcedure<E extends java.lang.Throwable,R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.iss.mv2.client.messaging.MessageProcedure<E,R>
      • de.iss.mv2.client.messaging.SwingMessageProcedure<E,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - The type of the result.
    E - The type of exception that can occur during this procedure.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientCertificateRequestProcedure, LoginProcedure

    public abstract class SwingMessageProcedure<E extends java.lang.Throwable,R>
extends MessageProcedure<E,R>
    A procedure to execute and manage subsequent server calls. The execution of this procedure is done in a single thread while the listeners will be called on Swings Event Dispatcher Thread.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer

      protected void setEventThreadSynchronizer(ThreadSynchronizer synchronizer)

    • Method Detail

      • setEventThreadSynchronizer

        protected void setEventThreadSynchronizer(ThreadSynchronizer synchronizer)
        Description copied from class: MessageProcedure
        Sets the synchronizer that is used to invoke the event methods of the registered listeners.

        Remarks: Invoke this method during the construction or initialization of a new procedure. Changing the synchronizer during the execution of this procedure can cause unexpected behavior.

        Overrides:
        setEventThreadSynchronizer in class MessageProcedure<E extends java.lang.Throwable,R>
        Parameters:
        synchronizer - The synchronizer to set. If the given synchronizer is null it will be reset to its default.
